__e: Look, Father, even if the boys didn't kill Zoey, and that is a big "if," that means the killer's still out there. And if the killer thinks we're hanging it on those boys, maybe he'll let his guard down.
It's because I'm in love with Zoey... and she's married, so it needs to stop.
Look, I was just really surprised at what Zoey told me, and I...
I-I know you're upset, Captain. I-I just... I want to assure you nothing happened between me and Zoey until after you guys had split up.
I know you're upset, Captain, but I promise you nothing happened between me and Zoey until after you guys split up, okay?
You know, now that Zoey and I aren't together, I don't see any reason why I shouldn't be doing my own thing.
It's only when his mom's out of town that he stays here, and Zoey helps me with that.
Zoey's baby reminded me that I do not want a baby.
